[b]Description:[/b]
The new version of the relatively small, versatile text editor. it allows editing as simple text files of different formats and web pages, and you get all the tools you need for a comfortable tasks. It is worth paying attention to the development and programmers, because the editor is able to highlight the syntax, it does so with different types of files and Internet addresses, download EditPlus is possible by going to the full news.
If you are looking for a worthy replacement for the standard Windows notebook from the company, I think this program is fully capable to meet your needs, but that's no Russian support, which may disappoint some users of our project, and in general to work for them actually quite convenient. EditPlus is distributed in two versions, regular and portable, the second can be written on any drive and then you can transfer it and run on different systems at the same time without leaving traces on your hard drive and registry.
As stated above, EditPlus can highlight syntax, if for some reason, the backlight does not work, you can from the official site to download the necessary additional syntax, and if you do well versed in all of this, then create your own. Note that the editor is built in a good browser for doing the preview, it is necessary when working with Web pages, referrals are also available. Of course, you can immediately send the desired file via FTP, for this there is a good manager. EditPlus and has a good HTML panel, through which much easier to work with tags. If desired, you can create your own toolbar, you can record macros, there are automatic completion mode dialed your words. The editor can work with text files of unlimited size, it all depends on memory, how much it will allocate you a place in this case with the file and you will be able to work.
By and large this is all that I wanted to convey to you, we can only hope, as always, that EditPlus is useful to you in the household if have any comments on the program, may want to praise the development, be sure to leave your comments.

Developer : ES-Computing

[b]How to Install:
32bit Installation:[/b]
1- Run "epp410p0880_0821.exe" and install it
2- Use "keygen.exe" to register it

[b]64bit Installation:[/b]
1- Run "epp410p0880_0821_64bit.exe" and install it
2- Use "keygen.exe" to register it

3- That's all. Enjoy full version
